This is easily one of the best games ever, can't recommend it enough.

Some solutions are ridiculously easy but then you're bombarded with 'use your brain, dimwit' and turrets and feels and the overall ambience that screams WHAT IN THE FRESH HELL OMG CHILL. The level design is very atmospheric and can turn the player into a ragequitting monster. The game is short but fresh. Loved the little details that depicted a downfall of the place and hidden messages with scribbles all around. It definitely added to the feeling of loneliness.

The antagonist, Glados, is superb; she seems like Shodan's fraternal twin. Sadistic humour is always appreciated. Very quotable. Very likeable. 
You hate her, she hates you. And you want more of her roasts when she's too silent.

Plus, you get the Companion Cube.
Every game should have a Companion Cube.
Great game, although it is from 2007, it is still one of the best games i have ever played, I would recommend.

While it's not a very complicated game, it was a really enjoyable experience and I think everybody should play through it at least once. Portal is, to me, a timeless classic and I can't wait to play the sequel.
